StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
• 12+ years of strong experience in Software Development on various technologies & tools with deep knowledge of SDLC, Waterfall & Agile(Scrum) having good debugging, requirement analysis, team management, client handling and problem solving skills.
• Functional domain experience includes Telecom/H&PS/BFS/Infrastructure Management applications.
• Strong skills include Core Java, Data Structures, Algorithms, Design Patterns, Databases & quick learner.
• Have 11 years of strong experience of interacting with the clients, requirements, data & application analysis & designing the approaches/solutions.
• 5+ years of strong experience in leading the team to successfully delivering the projects, strongly appreciated by the clients & managers.


CAREER ASPIRATION

To work in a technically competitive environment on challenging assignments that shall yield the dual benefit of the job satisfaction and a steady-paced professional/financial growth.
